name: Please collect your things and leave.
name_original: Please collect your things and leave.
description:
Oh no! You just got let go!

Collect your stuff and put it into a cardboard box to bring home. This simple task quickly turns into mayhem as the office is torn apart in your efforts.

This game was created during the Unreal Engine summer gamejam of 2018.

Controls: (NOT LISTED IN GAME!)

Gamepad (xbox):

Left stick: Move character.
Right stick: Move camera.
Left trigger: Grab with left hand.
Right trigger: Grab with right hand.
A: Jump
X: Crouch

Keyboard Mouse:

WASD: Move character.
Mouse: Move camera.
Left Mouse Button: Grab with left hand.
Right Mouse Button: Grab with right hand.
Space bar: Jump
C/Left Shift: Crouch
